creator: ln177p@att.com
text:
We need to load test our web based (flex AMF protocol) application.
We are able to record the AMF request and also rerun the TestPlan. 
We need to parameterize the arbitarily created binary file but we couldnot achieve it. To test scenarios we require swf to be parameterized. Please help us the way and provide us the solution to goahead.

creator: rachit.mathur24@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> We need to load test our web based (flex AMF protocol) application.
> We are able to record the AMF request and also rerun the TestPlan. 
> We need to parameterize the arbitarily created binary file but we couldnot
> achieve it. To test scenarios we require swf to be parameterized. Please help
> us the way and provide us the solution to goahead.

This is out of scope for JMeter.

If you want to modify SWF files you will need to use an external tool to do it.

Or you may be can use a BSF or BSH pre-processor to do the modifications.
creator: sebb@apache.org
